name: Mailgun Ruby on Rails Example
description: A simple form that sends email via Mailgun's API and/or SMTP

MAILGUN_API_KEY.description: Your Mailgun API Key (available from your control panel https://mailgun.com/cp)

MAILGUN_DOMAIN.description: Your sending domain (that you added to Mailgun)

MAILGUN_SMTP_USERNAME.description: SMTP Username (available from 'domains' tab of control panel)

MAILGUN_SMTP_PASSWORD.description: SMTP Password (available from 'domains' tab of control panel)
